price: 26 Voilà bien un enseignement pour quiconque craint le Seigneur.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّمَن يَخۡشَىٰٓ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan liman yakhshā
